## QueryResult interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface QueryResult<TData = unknown, TError = unknown>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                               | Modifiers | Type                                                                                                                                                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [data](./extensions.queryresult.data.md)                               |           | TData \| undefined                                                                                                                                                | The last successfully resolved data for the query.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [dataUpdatedAt](./extensions.queryresult.dataupdatedat.md)             |           | number                                                                                                                                                            | The timestamp for when the query most recently returned the <code>status</code> as <code>success</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [error](./extensions.queryresult.error.md)                             |           | TError \| null                                                                                                                                                    | The error object for the query, if an error was thrown.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [errorUpdateCount](./extensions.queryresult.errorupdatecount.md)       |           | number                                                                                                                                                            | The sum of all errors.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [errorUpdatedAt](./extensions.queryresult.errorupdatedat.md)           |           | number                                                                                                                                                            | The timestamp for when the query most recently returned the <code>status</code> as <code>error</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [failureCount](./extensions.queryresult.failurecount.md)               |           | number                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [failureReason](./extensions.queryresult.failurereason.md)             |           | TError \| null                                                                                                                                                    | The failure reason for the query retry. Reset to null when the query succeeds.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [fetchStatus](./extensions.queryresult.fetchstatus.md)                 |           | [QueryFetchStatus](./extensions.queryfetchstatus.md)                                                                                                              | - <code>fetching</code> - Is true whenever the queryFn is executing, which includes initial loading as well as background refetches. - <code>paused</code> - The query wanted to fetch, but has been paused. - <code>idle</code> - The query is not fetching.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [isError](./extensions.queryresult.iserror.md)                         |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isFetched](./extensions.queryresult.isfetched.md)                     |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be true if the query has been fetched.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [isFetchedAfterMount](./extensions.queryresult.isfetchedaftermount.md) |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be true if the query has been fetched after the component mounted. This property can be used to not show any previously cached data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [isFetching](./extensions.queryresult.isfetching.md)                   |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isInitialLoading](./extensions.queryresult.isinitialloading.md)       |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Is true whenever the first fetch for a query is in-flight.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [isLoading](./extensions.queryresult.isloading.md)                     |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isLoadingError](./extensions.queryresult.isloadingerror.md)           |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isPaused](./extensions.queryresult.ispaused.md)                       |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [isPlaceholderData](./extensions.queryresult.isplaceholderdata.md)     |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be <code>true</code> if the data shown is the placeholder data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [isPreviousData](./extensions.queryresult.ispreviousdata.md)           |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be true when <code>keepPreviousData</code> is set and data from the previous query is returned.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [isRefetchError](./extensions.queryresult.isrefetcherror.md)           |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be <code>true</code> if the query failed while fetching for the first time.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [isRefetching](./extensions.queryresult.isrefetching.md)               |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Is <code>true</code> whenever a background refetch is in-flight, which does not include initial loading.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [isStale](./extensions.queryresult.isstale.md)                         |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           | Will be <code>true</code> if the data in the cache is invalidated or if the data is older than the given <code>staleTime</code>.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [isSuccess](./extensions.queryresult.issuccess.md)                     |           | boolean                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [refetch](./extensions.queryresult.refetch.md)                         |           | (options?: [RefetchOptions](./extensions.refetchoptions.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; Promise&lt;[QueryResult](./extensions.queryresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TData, TError&gt;&gt; |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [status](./extensions.queryresult.status.md)                           |           | [QueryStatus](./extensions.querystatus.md)                                                                                                                        | - <code>loading</code> - if there's no cached data and no query attempt was finished yet. - <code>error</code> - if the query attempt resulted in an error. The corresponding error property has the error received from the attempted fetch. - <code>success</code> - if the query has received a response with no errors and is ready to display its data. The corresponding <code>data</code> property on the query is the data received from the successful fetch or if the query's <code>enabled</code> property is set to <code>false</code> and has not been fetched yet <code>data</code> is the first <code>initialData</code> supplied to the query on initialization. |
